020import io.papermc.paper.registry.RegistryAccess;
021import io.papermc.paper.registry.RegistryKey;
022import net.tnemc.item.providers.VersionUtil;
023import net.tnemc.plugincore.core.compatibility.ChunkProvider;
024import org.bukkit.Chunk;
025import org.bukkit.NamespacedKey;
026import org.bukkit.Registry;
027import org.bukkit.StructureType;
028import org.bukkit.block.Biome;
029import org.bukkit.generator.structure.Structure;
030import org.jetbrains.annotations.NotNull;
031
032import java.util.Locale;
033
034/**
035 * PaperChunkProvider
036 *
037 * @author creatorfromhell
038 * @since 1.1.0.1
039 */
040public class PaperChunkProvider implements ChunkProvider {
041
042  private final Chunk chunk;
043
044  public PaperChunkProvider(final Chunk chunk) {
045
046    this.chunk = chunk;
047  }
048
049  /**
050   * This method is responsible for calculating and returning an integer value.
051   *
052   * @return The calculated integer value.
053   */
054  @Override
055  public int x() {
056
057    return chunk.getX();
058  }
059
060  /**
061   * This method is responsible for returning a value of type int. The specific logic and
062   * calculations performed to determine this value are not documented.
063   *
064   * @return The integer value calculated by the method.
065   */
066  @Override
067  public int z() {
068
069    return chunk.getZ();
070  }
071
072  /**
073   * Checks if the ChunkProvider represents a slime chunk.
074   *
075   * @return True if the ChunkProvider is a slime chunk, false otherwise.
076   */
077  @Override
078  public boolean isSlime() {
079
080    return chunk.isSlimeChunk();
081  }
082
083  /**
084   * Checks if the specified biome is contained within the chunk provider.
085   *
086   * @param biome The biome to check for.
087   *
088   * @return True if the specified biome is contained, false otherwise.
089   */
090  @SuppressWarnings({ "removal", "UnstableApiUsage" })
091  @Override
092  public boolean containsBiome(final @NotNull String biome) {
093
094    try {
095
096      final Registry<@NotNull Biome> registry = RegistryAccess.registryAccess().getRegistry(RegistryKey.BIOME);
097
098      final NamespacedKey biomeKey = NamespacedKey.fromString(biome.toLowerCase(Locale.ROOT));
099      if(biomeKey == null) {
100        return false;
101      }
102
103      final Biome biomeObj = registry.get(biomeKey);
104      if(biomeObj == null) {
105        return false;
106      }
107
108      return chunk.contains(biomeObj);
109
110    } catch(final NoSuchMethodError ignore) {
111
112      return chunk.contains(Biome.valueOf(biome));
113    }
114  }
115
116  /**
117   * Checks if the provided structure is contained. Only on 1.21.1.
118   *
119   * @param structure The structure to check if contained.
120   *
121   * @return True if the structure is contained, false otherwise.
122   */
123  @Override
124  public boolean containsStructure(final @NotNull String structure) {
125
126    final Registry<@NotNull Structure> registry = RegistryAccess.registryAccess().getRegistry(RegistryKey.STRUCTURE);
127
128    final NamespacedKey structureKey = NamespacedKey.fromString(structure.toLowerCase(Locale.ROOT));
129    if(structureKey == null) {
130      return false;
131    }
132
133    final Structure structureObj = registry.get(structureKey);
134    if(structureObj == null) {
135      return false;
136    }
137
138    return !chunk.getStructures(structureObj).isEmpty();
139  }
140}
